thread.title: Marriage proposal live on stage
thread.title_full: Marriage proposal live on stage | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Marriage proposal live on stage
text:
Credit: Regent Centre The Regent Centre at Christchurch has just had its first ever surprise marriage proposal live on stage! Mark Dolan got down on bended knee just prior to the grand finale of the Gang Show
He proposed to his partner, Beckie Shaylor, in front of the cast of Christchurch Scouts & Guides and their audience of 300 Gang Show fans.
And, of course, she said yes!
Last updated Fri 24 Feb 2017 Entertainment
